com.flamingOctoIronman.core.manager

Class CoreManagerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flamingOctoIronman.framework.manager.ManagerManager<CoreManager,CoreEvent>
      • com.flamingOctoIronman.core.manager.CoreManagerManager

  • public class CoreManagerManager
extends ManagerManager<CoreManager,CoreEvent>
    This class handles all of the game's CoreManagers. It is used to create an instance of all managers, and to register them with the game's CoreEventBusService. This class implements the singleton design pattern, call {@link CoreManagerManager#getInstance(CoreEventBusService)
    Author:
    Quint
